testcase.classname: Verify below features of Rediff app
testcase.name: Verify login with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in login page..........................................passed When user enter valid username and valid password...........................passed And click on signin button..................................................passed Then user should be able to logged in.......................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify below features of Rediff app
testcase.name: Verify login with valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in login page..........................................passed When user enter valid username and invalid password.........................passed And click on signin button..................................................passed Then user should not be able to logged in...................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify below features of Rediff app
testcase.name: Verify forgot password link
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in login page..........................................passed Then forgot password link should be displayed in login page.................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify below features of Rediff app
testcase.name: Verify create a new account link
testcase.system-out: Given user should be in login page..........................................passed Then create new account link should be displayed in login page..............passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
